Home Projects About Contact NL

Together with Bieke, we created a website to boost her business. The goal was to lower the hurdle for potential clients to make an appointment and to boost work inquiries.

Our goal was a simple, no-nonses and easy-to-use website.

Performs everywhere

The site has a mobile-first attitude. This ensures the focuses on a no-nonsens and blazing fast experience.

Simple content management with Perch CMS

By using the low-profile Perch CMS, the site is easy to maintain while keeping it blazing fast.

You can see more at biekedejonghe.be
